summary: Oats (Avena sativa) are a type of grain grown for their seeds. They were likely domesticated alongside other cereals and are well-suited to cool, wet climates with acidic soil. Oats are less affected by diseases and weeds compared to other grains. They are commonly consumed as oatmeal, with Canada and Russia being the top producers. Oats are nutritious, helping to lower cholesterol and reduce the risk of heart disease. They are also used as animal feed and green manure.
title: Oat
